TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit HandleProcessCorruptedStateExceptionsAttribute extends System.Attribute

summary.span: 启用托管代码以处理用于指示损坏的进程状态的异常。

span.span: Enables managed code to handle exceptions that indicate a corrupted process state.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 损坏的进程状态例外情况是异常指示进程状态已损坏。Corrupted process state exceptions are exceptions that indicate that the state of a process has been corrupted. 我们不建议在此状态下执行应用程序。We do not recommend executing your application in this state. 默认情况下，公共语言运行时 (CLR) 不传递给托管代码，这些异常并`try` / `catch`块 （和其他异常处理子句） 不为其调用。By default, the common language runtime (CLR) does not deliver these exceptions to managed code, and the `try`/`catch` blocks (and other exception-handling clauses) are not invoked for them. 如果在完全确定你想要维护你处理这些异常，则必须应用属性为你想要执行的异常处理子句的方法。If you are absolutely sure that you want to maintain your handling of these exceptions, you must apply the attribute to the method whose exception-handling clauses you want to execute. CLR 将损坏的进程状态异常传递到仅在同时具有方法中的适用的异常子句和属性。The CLR delivers the corrupted process state exception to applicable exception clauses only in methods that have both the and attributes. 您还可以添加[ \](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/runtime/legacycorruptedstateexceptionspolicy-element.md)到应用程序的配置文件的元素。You can also add the [\](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/runtime/legacycorruptedstateexceptionspolicy-element.md) element to your application's configuration file. 这将确保损坏的状态异常都传送到异常处理程序而无需或属性。This will ensure that corrupted state exceptions are delivered to your exception handlers without the or attribute. 此配置元素已在以前的版本编译的应用程序不会影响[!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)]中运行，但[!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)]或更高版本; 损坏的状态异常将继续传递这些应用程序。This configuration element has no effect on applications that were compiled in versions previous to the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)] but are running in the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)] or later; corrupted state exceptions will continue to be delivered for those applications. 属性时，将忽略时遇到的部分受信任或透明的代码，因为受信任的主机不应允许的不受信任外接程序以捕获并忽略这些严重异常。The attribute is ignored when it is encountered in partially trusted or transparent code, because a trusted host should not allow an untrusted add-in to catch and ignore these serious exceptions. 有关损坏的进程状态异常的详细信息，请参阅文章[处理损坏状态异常](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=179681)CLR 全面透彻解析博客中。For more information about corrupted process state exceptions, see the entry [Handling Corrupted State Exceptions](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=179681) in the CLR Inside Out blog.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.
